buyAndVest().details: Function to be called by intending vestor. Amount of BNB to spend is sent to this function

params._daysToExtendSaleBy: The number of days to extend the end date by

getRemainingTime().details: Get time remaining before sale ends

getTimeBeforeStart().details: Get time remaining before sale starts

getTokensBought().details: Returns the amount of tokens bought

params._vestor: Address for which to view vesting detail

isInitialized().details: Returns a boolean value indication whether the counter has been started or not

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setFoundationAddress(address).details: Set foundation address. Can only be called by contract owner

setRate(uint256).details: Set the rate for the sale

startSale(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: Start the token sale. Can only be called by the foundation

params._daysToLast: The number of days the token sale should last
params.daysBeforeWithdrawal_: The number of days before tokens can be withdrawn after vesting

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdraw().details: Withdrawal function. Can only be called after vesting period has elapsed

withdrawBNB().details: Function to withdraw BNB deposited during sale. Can only be called by the foundation

withdrawLeftOverTokens().details: Function to withdraw left-over tokens. Can only be called by the foundation and after the sale has ended.
